body_html: @gunan Thank you for your suggestion, but my primary report already mentioned that manually linking CUDA library was not the solution. (I was already doing that.) By the way, adding --action_env=LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} fixes the problem without erasing build targets, so I'm closing this issue now. Further discussions would be in #16694.

body: @gunan Thank you for your suggestion, but my primary report already mentioned that manually linking CUDA library was not the solution. (I was already doing that.) By the way, adding `--action_env=LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}` fixes the problem without erasing build targets, so I'm closing this issue now. Further discussions would be in #16694.
